payload.titlePrimary: First Time in the Philippines: Bulacan to El Nido (Palawan Travel Vlog)

titleVariants.seo: First Time in the Philippines Travel Vlog | Bulacan to El Nido Palawan | Island Hopping, Food, Tips
titleVariants.emotional: Losing Track of Time in Paradise: Our First Trip to the Philippines
titleVariants.clickbait: We Didn’t Expect THIS in El Nido, Philippines!

payload.shortSummary: A first-time trip to the Philippines from Bulacan to El Nido, Palawan—meeting family, battling jet lag, exploring lagoons and beaches, and sharing practical travel tips.
payload.longDescription:
Join us on our first-ever trip to the Philippines! We start with family time in Bulacan (Marilao), adjusting to an 18-hour time jump from Hawaii and soaking up the local vibe before heading out for an island getaway in El Nido, Palawan. From travel logistics to first impressions, we bring you along for the full experience.
In El Nido, we explore iconic limestone cliffs, turquoise lagoons, white-sand beaches, and vibrant marine life. Expect scenic boat rides, snorkeling, market snacks, and laid-back sunsets—plus our honest take on what surprised us most. We also share quick tips on getting around, what to budget for tours, and how to plan your first visit.
Whether you’re researching your first Philippines trip or reliving your last island-hopping adventure, this vlog captures the excitement, family connection, and natural beauty that make Palawan unforgettable.

shortsHooks: We jumped 18 hours into the future flying from Hawaii to the Philippines!
Our first look at El Nido’s insane limestone cliffs.
Crystal-clear water you have to see to believe.
How much does island hopping in Palawan really cost?
Trying Filipino market snacks for the first time.
Family time in Bulacan before paradise in Palawan.
This El Nido sunset felt unreal.
